title: Is Publisher Rocket Worth it For KDP Low Content Books? - A Review
description:
Is Publisher Rocket Worth it For KDP Low Content Books? - A Review

New to KDP Publishing? - Start Here: https://youtu.be/LAIDXxUAgNw

Gumroad Store for Interiors and Keywords: https://gumroad.com/paulmarles

Publisher Rocket: https://marlcb--rocket.thrivecart.com/publisher-rocket/

Publisher Rocket is one of the many tools I use in my research for KDP low content books. There are many different tools you can use in doing your keyword research to find the best books that will make money online and bring in decent royalties. It's also possible to get overwhlemed with the number of tools that are available. In this video I take a look at some of the common features that I use in this piece of software to make my research quicker. I look at whether it is worth buying publisher rocket or just doing the research yourself manually. After all money is time and if there are short cuts it could save you time and help you make more money.

Tools and Resources I use:

Creative Fabrica: http://bit
